Hey folks! Long time no see! A lot has happened during that time. And of course, we have new projects, which we would be happy to show you. We‚Äôve opened new offices with great interiors, held awesome events, made new user-friendly interfaces for our products and much more. Acronis is growing at a very fast pace and, of course, we believe that the design team is one of the main drivers of this success. Design and peace to all!

The fourth anniversary of the Acronis Sofia R&D Center

This summer, we are celebrating the fourth anniversary of the Acronis R&D Center in Sofia. Sofia‚Äôs office is rapidly growing: from 20 people in 2018 to its current headcount of nearly 600. By the way, we also have another reason to be proud of this anniversary: Acronis Sofia Office Space is an Iron Design Award winner in the 2021‚Äì2022 Interior Space and Exhibition Design Award category.

NV Tower is a large and innovative project for a multifunctional building located in an attractive area in the southeast section of the city of Sofia. The project follows the most up-to-date urban and architectural trends: multifunctionality, extensive public spaces in different areas of the building, richly landscaped roofs and facades, and carefully constructed architectural silhouettes, taking into account the context of the environment.

The concept was developed in consideration of global company brand policies and the highest standards in finishes, security, hygiene and innovation. During the challenging time of the global pandemic, the development of the design was undertaken through the collaboration and coordination of multiple teams within the company, located in different countries and even continents.

The space was planned and decorated in such a manner that it will leave an indelible impression once visited. The impact of the brand DEEP BLUE COLOR is so striking that visitors cannot possibly help but be favorably impressed. Upon entry, you are immediately aware that you are at Acronis.

Reunite & Accelerate ‚Äî Acronis Partner Day 2022 in Munich

On May 5, 2022, Acronis partners and service providers from across the DACH region gathered together for Reunite and Accelerate ‚Äî Acronis Partner Day, 2022. Germany, Austria, Switzerland and the rest of the region comprise a tight-knit community of Acronis partners and IT leaders important to our success. This gathering offered great networking possibilities, exciting cyber protection demos, and inspiring sessions and business opportunities at the amazing MotorWorld facility in Munich.

CyberFit Summit World Tour

Miami, Schaffhausen, Dubai and Singapore ‚Äî more than 150 innovative and inspiring speakers, thousands of partners in person, and tens of thousands of online participants who discovered and discussed trends that are shaping the cyber protection industry. Offline and online activities were in parallel, like two universes that were destined to become one.

The Hubilo Virtual Event Platform became our ‚Äúmission control‚Äù center. We designed all the elements in the platform in keeping with Acronis style. It genuinely felt as if we had developed a separate, user-friendly platform for our big event.

Acronis Events

Acronis organizes and participates in hundreds of events, conferences and webinars every year. We needed to create new and more better Acronis events hub in which:

Visitors would be able to quickly navigate and find events based on their type, location and language categories.

Event managers wouldbe able to publish, update and remove events easily.

Publishing and updating events to Acronis.com would be automatic and seamless.

We had several major requirements in this undertaking:

Create an interface that provides information on all upcoming events relevant to the user location.

Design the interface in a way that navigation provides easy access to recorded webinars based on their category and product.

Create an archive of all past events with filters to find any event.

Display only the events relevant to the user‚Äôs location ‚Äî both online and offline.

Cyber Protect Cloud. Advanced Data Loss Prevention (DLP)

Advanced DLP empowers you, with unmatched provisioning and management simplicity, to prevent data leakage from clients‚Äô workloads via peripheral devices and network communications. With automatic initial DLP policy creation, you can accurately and efficiently create business-specific policies for each client.

Current DLP solutions require costly security expertise and deep knowledge of clients‚Äô business processes, together with complex, error-prone, manual configuration to ensure client-specific policies. With Advanced DLP, you can prevent data leaks for clients with the provisioning speed and policy management ease you need.

Learn more about Advanced Data Loss Prevention (DLP)

Acronis Partner Express Signup

A new flow and way to sign up new partners without involvement of the inside sales team. It replicates the process of qualification of new service provider prospects and enables Acronis to scale the partner acquisition. This is the first time partner acquisition and account creation are fully automated and new Acronis partners are forwarded directly to their success managers.

Partnership with Sale Sharks

Under their agreement, Acronis provides Sale Sharks with access to state-of-the-art cyber protection solutions for critical data assets. In addition, Acronis aids the team in analyzing its collected data with the help of AI and machine learning (AI/ML) technology to enhance on-pitch performance.

Mark Cueto, Commercial Director at Sale Sharks, comments: ‚ÄúWe are delighted to have linked up with Acronis and it‚Äôs a partnership that will work both ways with their solutions perfectly matching our cyber protection needs. Acronis has a well-deserved reputation for providing global sports teams with the protection they need to keep data safeguarded, so we‚Äôre looking forward to working with them. Their solutions cause minimal disruption to day-to-day operations which is important to us; but the cyber protection they also offer guarantees that data can‚Äôt be illegally tampered with, offering even greater peace of mind.‚Äù

Learn more about the partnership with Sale Sharks

Acronis Cyber Foundation. Hope and humanity ‚Äî Dreams of children from Ukraine art exhibition

When the first waves of refugees from Ukraine poured into the coastal city of Burgas in Bulgaria, Acronis employees started to think about how they could help. One of their ideas was to help children process their emotions through art. Evgeniy Susov, a senior designer with Acronis, teamed up with Yulia Krasovska, a professional artist who migrated to Bulgaria five years ago from Ukraine, to start art therapy classes for children.

From May 23‚Äì25, the ‚ÄúDreams of Children from Ukraine‚Äù exhibit displayed the children‚Äôs art. More than 50 children shared their experiences and showed their art to the local Burgas community. Acronis Cyber Foundation organized the event and provided gifts for the children.

Art therapy involves using various creative techniques such as drawing, painting, collage, coloring or sculpting to help people express themselves artistically and examine their art‚Äôs psychological and emotional undertones. Art therapy can help children and youth confront their emotions, relieve stress, and reduce anxiety.

The project is being led by Evgeny Susov and Yulia Krasovska and is supported by the municipality of Burgas, Cultural Center ‚ÄúSea Casino,‚Äù Association of Ukrainian Organizations in Bulgaria, ‚ÄúMother Ukraine,‚Äù Mikhal Aprilskaya, Acronis Cyber Foundation, the online edition of Gramofona.com, advertising agency ‚ÄúAdd an image‚Äù, BurgasVoices, Children‚Äôs Choir, Milka Stoeva, photographer Mikhail Kostadinov, Krasovska Art School, Alla Kostenko, Olesya Danilyuk, Karina Nenasheva, Valentina Shevchenko and others.

Learn more about Acronis Cyber Foundation

Meet the team. Evgeniy Susov

Hi, I‚Äôm Genie. I‚Äôve been working for Acronis since 2014 as a contractor and later as a regular employee. I started in the Acronis events, P.R. and communications team as a generalist designer who has helped with everything from digital and print to merchandise modeling. I eventually moved to the digital design team to continue gaining experience in UI and UX. Together with my family, I live in Bulgaria.

About teamwork

I‚Äôve never met so many cool guys here at Acronis who are ready to provide support with anything. And I mean not only the designers. The global events team is a part of the larger marketing team that serves the whole company. It‚Äôs a pleasure to work directly with our CEOs (thank you, Serg and Patrick for your patience and kind words) and senior executives (thank you, Oleg, Yuri, Gaidar and Eze) in order to help their presentations look perfect while they represent the company.

About zone of the responsibility

As a part of the digital design team, I not only work on digital projects, such as product web pages, banners, communication letters, etc., but also with other Acronis teams to ensure we achieve optimum collaboration to help reduce the burden on the digital team.

About Acronis

It‚Äôs really cool that there are so many different types of tasks in this mono-brand company that you‚Äôll never get bored. And it‚Äôs great to see how one‚Äôs work positively affects people throughout the entire company, and how they effectively leverage templates, recordings, and guidelines.

We are hiring

Want to join our highly-accomplished international design team? Acronis is a hyper-growth cyber protection company. If you are passionate about technology, responsive, alert, able to make firm decisions and have the grit to see things through, we have a place for you. Feel free to apply now!
